HeroSection.Introduction: If programming is the closest thing we have to magic, then I want to be a wizard.

AboutSection.AboutText:
Hello! My name is Dmitry, and I am a passionate developer from Novosibirsk, Russia.
I am currently delving into the world of programming and mathematics at the Novosibirsk State Technical University, within the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science.
I am drawn to the pursuit of self-improvement and experimenting with Computer Networks and AI.

Education.Title: Education
Education.University: I am a fourth-year student at the Novosibirsk State Technical University, Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Informatics.

Udemy.FirstShooter: My first acquaintance with Unreal Engine.

ExperienceSection.SubText: What I have done so far

Points.FirstPoint: Gaining first commercial experience in mobile game development.
Points.SecondPoint: Collaborating with different teams including designers and other developers.
Points.ThirdPoint: Solving problems of various complexities, ranging from project tasks to self-improvement.

ProjectsSection.ProjectsText: Below you can see the projects I've worked on. Some of them were created entirely by me, while others were created as a result of taking courses. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories.

Projects.SwapAndTap:
A rhythm game like Osu.
You need to tap on game elements to the rhythm. The source code was lost, but I still have the APK and gameplay record :)
Projects.TreasureHunting:
The goal of the project is to experiment with a procedural maze generation algorithm.
You appear in a random spot within a procedurally generated maze, and your task is to find a hidden trophy.
Projects.ForsakenHero:
Behavior tree vs neural network, which is better?
The project aims to incorporate a machine learning model into the game and see what comes out of it.
Projects.MysticEchoes:
Top-down game written without any engine in pure C#.
Your quest is clear: purge every room of its enemies to emerge victorious.
Projects.ShooterGame:
Udemy project.
My first encounter with Unreal Engine. A third-person shooter with animations, shooting, AI, sounds and more.
Projects.LaserDefender:
Udemy project.
Top-down space shooter with coroutines, waypoints, scriptable objects, and more.

EmailSection.EmailText:
Interested in working together? We should queue up a time to chat.
Let's create something meaningful!
